content.p: The University of Nottingham has been recognised for its transformational research that improves the lives of millions of people following the publication of the Research Excellence Framework (REF) 2021. In the Faculty of Social Sciences, more than 98% of research is of international quality according to REF, with 85% graded as world-leading or internationally excellent. For the university as a whole, during the REF period more than 100 million people have engaged with or been positively impacted by our research. These results show our research continues to make a difference to millions of people across wide range of areas, championing responses to key global challenges, transforming lives and shaping the future. Examples include: lz-foss-core-ops@exmail.nottingham.ac.uk Current student enquiries
